description:
Learn the basic concepts and skills that you will need to be able to code a Website!

The good thing is, we make it even better by making it responsive.

Build a strong foundation in Web Development with this tutorial for beginners.

  • HTML5
  • CSS3
  • Bootstrap
  • jQuery

What am I going to get from this course?

  • Over 12 lectures and 1.5 hours of content!
  • Learn Web Development from an experienced Web Developer from your own desk.
  • Suitable for beginner.
  • You learn by project instead of learning by doing!
  • We go even further beyond and code a better version of Facebook!

--- Update 11th February 2016 ---

Thanks for your feedback. I will update my lectures with more explaination starting with the lecture 5, so that it is easier for you to understand the code. It will happen latest till tomorrow. So stay tuned!

--- Update 11th February 2016 ---

There is a 1st improved lecture, which is the lecture 5. There will be many other improved lectures. So stay tuned!

--- Update 11th February 2016 ---

There is a free preview of lecture 5 now.

--- Update 12th February 2016 ---

There is a 2nd improved lecture, which is the lecture 6.

--- Update 19th February 2016 ---

There is a 3rd improved lecture, which is the lecture 7.

--- Update 10th March 2016 ---

There will be more improved lectures, so stay tuned!
title: Create a Website Similar to Facebook from Scratch!
